CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBehave
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 몬스터의 단순 이동 동작
if self.ParentAI.time >= self.ParentAI.tick then self.ParentAI.time = 0
local MonsterEntity = self.ParentAI.Entity local Direction = nil local FlipX = false local Position = MonsterEntity.TransformComponent.Position local Destination = self.ParentAI.Destination local CurrentState = MonsterEntity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName
local Range = MonsterEntity.MonsterAIComponent.Range
if Position.x > Destination.x + Range then MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") MonsterEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = false MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(-1, 0), 0.1) elseif Position.x < Destination.x - Range then MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") MonsterEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = true MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(1, 0), 0.1) elseif Destination.x - Range < Position.x and Destination.x + Range > Position.x and CurrentState ~= "IDLE" then MonsterEntity.MonsterAIComponent.Source = Vector2(Position.x, Position.y) MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("IDLE") MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:Stop() end end
return BehaviourTreeStatus.Success
